page.title: 10MEDIA,TV,NEWSPAPERS,MAGS.
page.content: {Television}means seeing pictures from a far. We all can watch it if we have a set.Favourte programes today are Street Hawk,Dynasty,Dallas, He-man,Nature programmes and Auf Wiedersehen Pet. The {radio}is still very popular.There is a lot of music to listen to but the news is very inportant.The sun {Newspaper}to be the most populer newspaper in our area. This is a national paper. The Journal is the favourite{local paper}as is the {Evening Chronicle}at night.We also get free news papers the{Leader}and the{ {Courier}but people did not mention them as being read in their homes. Specialist{magazines}about hobbies and interests are quite popular.The most popular are{Home Computer,Homes and {gardens,British Birds}and{Camping.}
